regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)class="competition".*?title="Buffstreams([^"]*)"\s*href="([^"]*).*?score">\s*([^<]*)\n.', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('[makelist.param2]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) #z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyw(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreamer' not in i[0]] #sort1 = [(client.tinyw(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z ] return sort #+ sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control from datetime import datetime, timedelta import re,requests current_date = datetime.now() date_format = current_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d") page_data = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/api/nba-tournaments?date=' + date_format, headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text r = re.findall('(?s)},"id":([^,]*).*?nk":"([^"]*).*?ion":"([^"]*).*?awayTeam":{"name":"([^"]*).*?name":"([^"]*)","logo":"([^"]*).*?ent":"([^"]*).*?ent":"([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace('\\',''),i[2],i[3],i[4],i[5].replace('\\',''),i[6],i[7]) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + url + '/' + 'nba' + '?origin=sportscentral.io', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://sportscentral.io'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z1 = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="(https:\/\/streamcheck.link[^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z1 if 'streamcheck' not in i[0]] return sort1 + sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re page_data = client.request('https://v2.sportsurge.net/list-basketball') page_data = page_data.split('>WATCH<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('<footer class=',1)[0] s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?h4>([^<]*).*?h4>.*?h4>([^<]*).*?;">([^<]*)',page_data) r = [('https://v2.sportsurge.net/'+i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in s] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('[makelist.param1]') r = re.findall('(?s)game-forecast-link MobildeGoster.*?ef=\'([^\']*).*?4>([^<]*)',page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in r if 'Stream East' not in i[1] if 'dudestream' not in i[1] if 'chenstream' not in i[1] if 'NbaStreams' not in i[1] if 'Livefreegame' not in i[1] if 'tvsportslive' not in i[1] if 'bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Dubz Streams' not in i[1] if 'Freetvlive1' not in i[1] if 'NoDelayStream' not in i[1] if 'Sportinglivestreamz' not in i[1] if 'Icelz ' not in i[1] if 'bestnhl.com' not in i[1] if 'papahd' not in i[1] if 'Sports News' not in i[1] if 'sportsio' not in i[1] if 'Streamos' not in i[1] if 'SoccerJumboTV' not in i[1] if 'streamhd247' not in i[1] if 'babysharkstream' not in i[1] if 'Icelz' not in i[1] if 'MyGoodStream' not in i[1] if 'Semensport' not in i[1] if 'Bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Sports24' not in i[1] if 'Yoursports Stream' not in i[1] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1] if 'sportsway' not in i[1] if 'summerstream' not in i[1] if 'RoyStream' not in i[1] if 'BuffStreams' not in i[1] if 'Time4tv' not in i[1]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re page_data = page_data.split('Live Streams and Schedule<',1)[-1] s = re.findall('(?s)href="([^"]*).*?ing">([^<]*).*?>.*?>\s*([^<]*)\n+',page_data) return s

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64 x = re.findall('window.atob\(\'([^\']*)',page_data)[0] x = base64.b64decode(x).decode('utf-8') return x + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:107.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/107.0&Referer=https://www.thecrackstreams.live'

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64,xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') s = re.findall('(?s)<iframe.*?src="([^"]*)',page_data)[0] r = client.request(s) x = re.findall('(?:source|src|file):\s*[\'"]([^\'"]+)',r)[0] pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return x + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:107.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/107.0&Referer=' + s

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = page_data.split('NBA Live Streams Schedule',1)[-1] r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>\s+([^\n]*)', page_data) r = [(i[0],i[1],client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[2]), i[3]) for i in r if 'png' in i[1]] r = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in r if 'All Games' not in i[2]] return r

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return u = client.request('http://www.hesgoal.com/') r = re.findall('(?s)class="file(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">)([^<]*)',u) r = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in r if 'vs' in i[2] if 'NBA' in i[3]] return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64,requests try: t = re.findall('(?s)<center><iframe(?:.*?src)="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] t = t.replace('//','http://') t = t.replace(' ', '%20') u = requests.get(t).text except: pass try: s = re.findall('atob\(["|\']([^"|\']*)', u)[0] s = base64.b64decode(s) except: pass try: s = re.findall('source: "([^"]*)', u)[0] except: pass return s + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=' + url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)game">([^<]*)(?:.*?href=")([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re w = re.findall('(?s)<iframe.*?id="volokit-feed"\s*src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] h = 'http://volokit.com' + w i = client.request(h) t = re.findall('(?s)<iframe.*?id="volokit-feed"\s*src="([^"]*)', i)[0] e = client.request(t) hat = re.findall('(?s)a href="([^"]*)', e)[0] the = client.request(hat) crew = re.findall('(?s)source:\s*\'([^\']*)', the)[0] return crew + '|Referer=' + hat

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = site.request('https://daddylive.live/') page_data = page_data.split('>Basketball<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Ice Hockey<',1)[0] e = re.findall('(?s)hr>([^<]*).*?href="([^"]*)', page_data) return e
